Name: Tender Flesh Heart
Tooltip: Up to 65% of your max life is gradually converted into mildew health
Mildew health regenerates faster than regular health
Your death is delayed for as long as your max mildew health decays
Increased life regeneration, defense and mildew health conversion based on the torn severity you're affected by
Source: Bug Trapper + Mildew Heart (@ Tinkerer's Workshop)
